Bloomington.Kelley School of Business: The Kelley School of Business (KSB) is an undergraduate and graduate business school at Indiana University in Bloomington, Indiana, United States. As of 2017, approximately 7,500 full-time undergraduate and graduate students are enrolled on its Bloomington campus, as well as 1,740 students at the Indianapolis campus. In addition, more than 800 students study for graduate degrees through the school's online MBA and MS programs through "Kelley Direct".
